0101011011111111 1000010001111100 0 -> sum: 1101101101111011, cout: 0
0101011011011010 1111011110101111 0 -> sum: 0100111010001001, cout: 1
1011111111000000 1101111111011101 0 -> sum: 1001111110011101, cout: 1
1100100011001011 1010011100110010 1 -> sum: 0110111111111110, cout: 1
0111000000000001 0000001000100111 0 -> sum: 0111001000101000, cout: 0
1110011110100100 0001111100010110 0 -> sum: 0000011010111010, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

1111111111111111 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
